rukus.text: All praise is for God, the Originator of the heavens and the earth, Who made angels ˹as His˺ messengers with wings—two, three, or four. He increases in creation whatever He wills. Surely God is Most Capable of everything
Whatever mercy God opens up for people, none can withhold it. And whatever He withholds, none but Him can release it. For He is the Almighty, All-Wise

O humanity! Remember God’s favours upon you. Is there any creator other than God who provides for you from the heavens and the earth? There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. How can you then be deluded ˹from the truth˺
If you are rejected by them, so too were messengers before you. And to God ˹all˺ matters will be returned ˹for judgment˺
O humanity! Indeed, God’s promise is true. So do not let the life of this world deceive you, nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about God
Surely Satan is an enemy to you, so take him as an enemy. He only invites his followers to become inmates of the Blaze
Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment. But those who believe and do good will have forgiveness and a great reward
